name: Clowns Mistake
description:
A clown made a really bad perfeormance (also the dev for making this game!) and now he has to dodge the things the audience throws at him.

Warning This game is terrible and make you wanna tie a hangman's noose for yourself rather than watch its awful graphics. 

Made for the Brackey Game Jam 2020.2 :)

Here i will help you with that :)

You also might need some eye bleach

https://www.amazon.com/under-eye-bleaching-cream/s?k=under+eye+bleaching+cream

Thank you for playing my stupid ass game :)
